sn46.40:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, nivarana andhakarana acakkhukarana annanakarana pannanirodhika vighatapakkhiya anibbanasamvattanika.
sn46.40:1.3: Kamacchandanivaranam, bhikkhave, andhakaranam acakkhukaranam annanakaranam pannanirodhikam vighatapakkhiyam anibbanasamvattanikam.
sn46.40:1.7: vicikicchanivaranam, bhikkhave, andhakaranam acakkhukaranam annanakaranam pannanirodhikam vighatapakkhiyam anibbanasamvattanikam.
sn46.40:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca nivarana andhakarana acakkhukarana annanakarana pannanirodhika vighatapakkhiya anibbanasamvattanika.
sn46.40:2.1: Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhanga cakkhukarana nanakarana pannabuddhiya avighatapakkhiya nibbanasamvattanika.
sn46.40:2.3: Satisambojjhango, bhikkhave, cakkhukarano nanakarano pannabuddhiyo avighatapakkhiyo nibbanasamvattaniko …pe… upekkhasambojjhango, bhikkhave, cakkhukarano nanakarano pannabuddhiyo avighatapakkhiyo nibbanasamvattaniko.
sn46.40:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga cakkhukarana nanakarana pannabuddhiya avighatapakkhiya nibbanasamvattanika”ti.
